quote_last: the first tiny snowflakes came loitering down and settled on Jill’s arm. Ten minutes later they were falling quite thickly. In twenty minutes the ground was noticeably white.
title: The Silver Chair
author: C.S. Lewis

quote_first: According to military records no US bombers or any other kind of aircraft were flying over that region at the time, that is
title: Kafka on the shore
author: Haruki Murakami
